heading: HR00136
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE INFLUX OF FOREIGN WORKERS IN THE PHILIPPINES AND FOR CONCERNED AGENCIES TO EXPEDITE THEIR JOINT MEMORANDUM THAT IMPOSES ADDITIONAL WORKING VISA REQUIREMENTS ON FOREIGN WORKERS

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00136
